title: Laura Díaz-Muñoz Manzanares
text:
ABOUT ME
I recently finished a M.S. in Cognitive Neuroscience of Language at the Basque Center on Cognition, Brain and Language (BCBL) in Spain.
Currently, I am highly motivated to pursue a Ph.D. position in the field of infant development, with a particular interest in the neurocognitive mechanisms underlying the successful development of reading skills prior to formal literacy instruction.


Research interests

Reading acquisition
Developmental dyslexia
Spoken and written language processing
Multilingualism



 Education

MSc in Cognitive Neuroscience of Language, BCBL, Spain
MA in Spanish and English as Second Languages
BA in Translation and Interpretation, University of Alicante, Spain
